main event: A civilian observer in Middletown, Ohio reported seeing a bright light object in the sky that stopped, moved in various directions, and then changed into two small red dots on June 20, 1965.
interesting points: The object appeared as a light about 20 times brighter than a star, with a 'rear guard'.
The object stopped, then moved in a north-west-south direction.
The bright white color of the object went out and was replaced by two small red dots.
The report concludes the object was possibly an aircraft.
sighted object: a bright light object that changed into two small red dots
